fields.content: Welcome to the very early alpha sneak peek of OpenEats 2.  This version is no where near complete and does not contain nearly all the features.  This version may be buggy, may crash, and your recipes may disappear.  This version is limited to being able to sign up for an account, add recipes, and limited search capabilities.  This is to show you what I have been up to, and for you to give feed back on what you like, don't like, and want to see in the forums.  So please sign up and start playing and try to break it (wish should be easy)
fields.title: OpenEats 2 Sneak Peek!
